resources.string: The \"Hibernation mode\" seems to be activated for the %1$s application. This mode can delay your alarm going off. \nTo be sure that %1$s wakes you up on time, please disable this mode by accepting the change proposed in the next layer.

The \"Hibernation mode\" seems to be activated for the %1$s application. This mode can delay your alarm going off. \nTo be sure that %1$s wakes you up on time, please disable this mode by unchecking %1$s in the list that will be displayed afterwards.
